attributes.action: Stop America from building a defence radar system near Russia, stop us from being NUKED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe if the US goes ahead with this plan, Russia will use this excuse to nuke our country , Europe does not belong to America , so why do they have to interfere , why can they not just look after their own country , Mr Prime Minister please do not let George Bush destroy our beautiful country. VETO this plan before it is to late.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
